data.title: Bug fix
data.body: Fix when scene been set a very large size(eg. 2048x1536), the simulator windows will been move out of window

data.title: BUG: 新建helloworld项目android会调用applicationWillEnterForeground，而ios不会
data.body:
问题描述：
1.新建helloworld项目android会调用applicationWillEnterForeground，而ios不会
2.3.4和3.5版本的android也不会调用，但是3.8和3.8.1会调用

这样导致接SDK时会发送两次数据

data.title: js_callFunc will not pass extra data parameter when no sender
Check that textureAtlas isn't null before removing quads in SpriteBatchNode
data.body: See issue #14122.

data.title: BAD_EXCEPTION crash in CCSpriteBatchNode::removeAllChildrenWithCleanup
data.body:
I've always seen `removeAllChildren()` as a very safe api to call, even if the node had already been processed as destroyed by cocos (like when leaving a scene) and you had pointers to it hanging around for some reason.  Usually you can call it with no negative consequences.

But `CCSpriteBatchNode` doesn't behave the same as the other Node types here.
You get a bad_exception on [this line](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/2d/CCSpriteBatchNode.cpp#L243) because `_textureAtlas` is null. 

I think this at least deserves an assert, but would checking for null be so bad? The check shouldn't effect performance and it makes it a lot safer.

data.title: 使用spriteFrameCache时重复加载image，效率很低
Set self texture uniform to GLProgramState if node js ProgressTimer
data.body:
I've created custom shader to run on a Sprite which need to send a texture mask uniform. 

```
    uniform sampler2D u_maskTexture;
```

For an example, this is my mask texture. I used it to set it as alpha channel for my sprite
![progress-bar-alpha](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1469984/10424778/40715ab8-70fc-11e5-814d-0d3ef97a6654.jpg)

My main texture looks like
![progress-bar](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1469984/10424832/bf81e52a-70fc-11e5-83ee-a2606d988664.jpg)

Then i got result likes this
![colorbar](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1469984/10424841/d6286128-70fc-11e5-8a71-fc31ea3eb4ab.png)

But when i apply my custom shader to a ProgressTimer, I found out that my texture is not my mask texture anymore. It's main texture whose `x` channel is all one

I'd test and found that all `sampler2D` uniform variables are set to main texture

安卓没有问题
ios9,cocos2d-x3.81

data.title: c++_static over gnustl
data.body: c++_static fixes a lot of C++11 compatibility issues in gnustl. It should be the default C++ library for cocos. SDKBOX uses gnustl as well, and should be fixed too.

data.title: Fix typo in UIEditBox
data.body: Fixed minor typo and renamed `INTIAL_CAPS_ALL_CHARACTERS` to `INITIAL_CAPS_ALL_CHARACTERS` in UIEditBox

data.title: 3.8/3.81版本 js项目在android微信下会有偏移
data.body:
`cocos new Test -l js`新建一个项目
然后修改`mian.js`  `cc.view.setDesignResolutionSize(640, 960, cc.ResolutionPolicy.EXACT_FIT);`
运行项目 在android微信浏览器中就会产生偏移 并且可以拖动偏移的地方
![59_503580_682170a915d9df8](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/358364/10420651/3e242b0e-70cb-11e5-89d5-d3355892f060.jpg)
![1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/358364/10420682/c657945c-70cb-11e5-8871-d0f0eaf9de80.jpg)

使用未合并的3.6版本测试 不会产生偏移问题

测试手机华为CHE-TL00H  三星note3

data.title: Memory leak from CCSpriteFrameCacheHelper.cpp
data.body: In SpriteFrameCacheHelper's retainSpariteFrames function, it will retain every SpriteFrame defined in .plist file. However, when I call the purge function, the destructor of SpriteFrameCacheHelper does not call release for each SpriteFrame. I find that Cocos defines SpriteFrameCacheHelper::releaseSpriteFrames(const std::string &plistPath), however, this function dosen't been called for each file in _usingSpriteFrames when destroyed.

data.title: 当Sprite3D拥有多个mesh时候，setGLProgramState()有问题
data.body:
发现一个错误，当一个SPrite3D读取模型后拥有多个mesh时，用setGLProgramState()重设shader后模型渲染出错，这个模型是用了蒙皮骨骼动画的，shader的代码直接复制引擎提供的cc3D_SkinPositionTex_vert 和cc3D_ColorTex_frag。如下图，左边是用setGLProgramState的，右边没有，用的是同一个模型。
![ttt](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8038483/10420271/0aa8af92-70c2-11e5-8224-35b1bf39e65e.png)

data.title: AppDelegate deconstructor is not called on Android
Added line spacing/leading feature to Label
data.body: Not sure is this is something generally useful or if it can be done in any other way, but I needed the feature and I couldn't find anything already implemented for it.

data.title: Changed label font size type to float
data.body: Very useful for small (design) resolutions.

data.title: Removed scale factor for label shadow
data.body: Scale factor is not needed here.

data.title: TMXLayer cast bug
data.body: When using float values (for example the actual position of the character) to get the current tile, the wrong tile is sometimes/usually returned, because the index is not calculated properly.

data.title: [AUTO][ci skip]: updating cocos2dx_files.json
Any way to get class name for tolua C++ class?
data.body:
I want to call the follow wrap function like: `local w1 = wrap(cc.Node)` `local w1 = wrap(cc.Sprite)` etc...

``` Lua
function wrap(toluaclass)
  local meta = getmetatable(toluaclass)
  -- use meta here...
  return function(instacne)
    if iskindof(instacne, toluaclass) then -- Error here, needs 2nd arg to be a string.
       -- ...
    end
  end
end
```

`iskindof()` requires 2nd arg as a string.
I  can't find way to get class name for tolua C++ class (eg cc.Node, cc.Sprite ...).
